ii. All references included in the manuscript should be cited in the text.
iii. Figures and equations should not be scanned and should drawn using appropriate tools like Microsoft Equation Editor.
Please prepare the final CRC copy of the manuscript as per guidelines above and mail us the same with the signed copyright transfer form (http://bvicam.ac.in/bijit/Download.asp) latest within 10 days.

Congratulations, we are pleased to inform you that we are publishing your manuscript in BIJIT Vol. 8 No.1, Jan-June, 2016. With respect to the same we request you to kindly resubmit the signed Copyright Tranfer Form to us latest by 21st Dec, 2015.

Congratulations, your revised manuscript will be published in next issue of BIJIT (Jan-June, 2016 Vol. 8, No. 1). You are requested to email us the final CRC copy which should contain the following:
i. As per journals's policy, each manuscript published in the journal should contain atleast five references from previous BIJIT issues. All previous BIJIT issues can be referred from http://bvicam.ac.in/bijit/Archive.asp.
ii. All references included in the manuscript should be cited in the text.
iii. Figures and equations should not be scanned and should drawn using appropriate tools like Microsoft Equation Editor.
